subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Houston Comets, who won the W.N.B.A.’s first four championships, are disbanding, according to Donna Orender, the league’s president. Orender told the Houston television station KRIV that the Comets would be shut down because new owners could not be found. The W.N.B.A. took over the franchise earlier this year.
